duties_responsibilities.duty: Apply engineering principles in both field and office settings, working on team and individual projects.
Complete routine duties associated with day-to-day management of drilling, completions, production, gas processing, and pipeline operations.
Assist in preparing technical evaluations and generating operational procedures.
Support reservoir performance evaluations and identify developmental prospects.
Utilize technical skills acquired in college for on-the-job learning opportunities.
Assist Devon in assessing knowledge, skills, and abilities for talent pipeline growth.
Access to company benefits such as fitness facility and corporate housing.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing degree in Petroleum Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, or other related disciplines (Sophomore, Junior level)
Own transportation for daily commute, completion of background check and drug screen required
